recoverpassword.description: Enter your user name and we will send you the instructions to reset your password.
recoverpassword.email: Password reset successful, please check your inbox
recoverpassword.title: Have you forgotten your password?

restorePassword.description: Establish a new password and recover access to your account
restorePassword.passwordPattern: The password must contain at least one number, one capital letter, one symbol and its length must be between 8 and 50 characters.
restorePassword.title: New password
